# 𓏢

𓃀 𓈖 𓏏 𓏢 | harp | πανδοῦρα pandoûra, “three-stringed lute”. Compare pandore, banjo, mandolin ⇔
𓃀 𓈖 𓏏 𓏢 | harp | bent Band (Gummi) / banjo bandore bandurria
𓃀 𓈖 𓏏 𓏢 | harp | Latin pandura, pandurium, a musical instrument of three strings
𓃀 𓈖 𓏏 𓆱 | harp | φοῖνῐξ phoînix, a guitar-like instrument invented by the Phoenicians

𒌑𒈬 harp 𓏢 ⇔ 𓇗 арпа arpa (barley)
𒌑𒈬 šam-mu 𓏢 ⇔ 𓇗 זַמָּר zamár (barley)
𒌑𒈬 šam-mu 𓏢 ⇔ 𓇗 jęčьmy (barley) √bend
